channel.title: 317 server help please guys--!
channel.description:
Okay guys, I have a custom 317 server and want to release it to the public very soon. It's 317 as I said before.
Here is the details and such: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,416054.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,416054.0.html[/url]
I want to know how to transfer npc's from other 317's to my server and if it's easy enough how do I make my own? I searched it up and got nothing. What additional changes do I have to make when I transfer NPC's??? -------------Unresolved :(
Also how do I change the login messages? That happens when I log into the game. -------------Unresolved :(
I would also like to know how to change what my NPC's say and such and also where to place them, how do I find out my X,Y axis? -------------Unresolved :(
Then I would like to know how merge maps and addon maps or something like that, I can put a teleport to the area so that wouldn't be a problem. -------------Unresolved :(
I would also like to know how to add water to areas and populate maps with entities and npc's walk paths. -------------Unresolved :(
Also I want to know how to give updates out to all my clients without having to take down servers and distribute a whole new client. How do I do that??? -------------Unresolved :(
I know you guys are pros and know coding so please help :). I see you all brag being the biggest RS pserver then I want to see you prove it :D. THANKS!!! Please bump so I can get help quick, thanks.

item.title: 317 server help please guys--!
item.dc:creator: @assaulth3ro911 assaulth3ro911
item.description:
@assaulth3ro911 wrote:

Oh. whats ur email again… i forgot i cant add you lol.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2009, 12:06:10 pm[/size][hr]Uhh dude, I just found out, You download hamachi 2 and then log onto my network then close hamachi and you never need to open it again. Thats the easiest way. so it doesn’t really matter.

Read full topic

let just teamviewer it will be much easier.

item.title: 317 server help please guys--!
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“assaulth3ro911, post:1, topic:319756”]Also how do I change the login messages? That happens when I log into the game. -------------Unresolved

I would also like to know how to change what my NPC’s say and such and also where to place them, how do I find out my X,Y axis? -------------Unresolved :([/quote]
I am not a “pro” coder… I am not even a coder(any more) but I think I can solve these…

1st one. look in your client class (ctrl+f) and search for the welcome message.
2nd one. To make the npc’s say stuff I belive look in your npc handler class, and search for a message ones says(correct me on this one if I am wrong), as for the spawning area, autospawn.CFG is where you must look.

Please tell me if I helped…

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server help please guys--!
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

o.o srry

there isnt any npc’s in source that is in client il explain

go to class5.java in client then find the monster and then copy that text into your client in your class5.java
and then find the models in the class5 text and copy and paste the models to your client
then go to your source and find npc’s.java or cfg and then add your monster with the hp and stuff like thet
i cant remmeber the thing waht is goign to stand there just copy and paste another one and chnage the name and cb lvl and hp

and the two last one i can tell but i dont remember exactley now

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server help please guys--!
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

What additional changes do I have to make when I transfer NPC's???

if u mean like changing npc’s from a client to another i would go to class5.java and searched the monster and when u find it find the model and copy paste the models and the class5 ting to your new client :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2009, 09:41:30 am[/size][hr]

Also how do I change the login messages? That happens when I log into the game.

search what it says and then change what it says and this you can change in client.java

Read full topic

Okay guys, I have a custom 317 server and want to release it to the public very soon. It’s 317 as I said before.

Here is the details and such: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,416054.0.html
